text.__SUMMARY__:
Ribes humile, (ai cu li in Chinese, meaning swamp currant) is a tufted, dioecious shrub native to China, namely in Sichuan province. It is found along the sides of roads in montane woods and thickets, at 1000–3300 meters above sea-level.Minute flowers arrive in May through June; hairless, red, globular fruits forming in July to August.
